title: jack05
author: jack05
created_time: April 07, 2023, 10:28:07 AMLast edit: April 07, 2023, 11:33:23 AM by jack05
content: Hello, I am looking for a Philippine trading group where a seminar with the founder of the project Onigiri Neko (name of the project), was held in January or February. Does anyone know what group it is?Even if you are not sure, could you plese provide some examples of popular Filipino trading groups, then I will just ask them myself.Thanks

comments.author: bhadz
comments.body: I have never heard of that group. But you may have hard time looking for that group on this forum. Most of these Filipino trading groups can be found on social media, mainly in Facebook.It is because that's the social media that most of us use and you can see a lot of these trading groups there. While being a fan of Anime, Onigiri Neko are japanese terms and meaning of it are  Onigiri = rice ball and Neko = Cat. Well, that's just some trivia and anyway, this is the trading group that you probably are looking for.https://facebook.com/groups/472203605109045Members there are still active and just by reading some few comments, is there any problem related to investments/trading you guys have?

comments.author: jack05
comments.body: Quote from: bhadz on April 07, 2023, 11:25:06 AMI have never heard of that group. But you may have hard time looking for that group on this forum. Most of these Filipino trading groups can be found on social media, mainly in Facebook.It is because that's the social media that most of us use and you can see a lot of these trading groups there. While being a fan of Anime, Onigiri Neko are japanese terms and meaning of it are  Onigiri = rice ball and Neko = Cat. Well, that's just some trivia and anyway, this is the trading group that you probably are looking for.https://facebook.com/groups/472203605109045Members there are still active and just by reading some few comments, is there any problem related to investments/trading you guys have?Thank you for your reply and suggestions. However, there was a misunderstanding.Onigiri Neko is the name of the project that was promoted on the Philippine trading group - this is the group I am looking for.Sorry for the confusion

comments.author: Supreemo
comments.body: Quote from: jack05 on April 07, 2023, 11:35:30 AMQuote from: bhadz on April 07, 2023, 11:25:06 AMI have never heard of that group. Well, that's just some trivia and anyway, this is the trading group that you probably are looking for.https://facebook.com/groups/472203605109045Members there are still active and just by reading some few comments, is there any problem related to investments/trading you guys have?Thank you for your reply and suggestions. However, there was a misunderstanding.Onigiri Neko is the name of the project that was promoted on the Philippine trading group - this is the group I am looking for.Sorry for the confusionfirst time kong marinig ang ganyang name ng project. would you mind filling us details about that project para narin kung may kapwa man tayong pinoy na alam ang proyektong yan, mas madali ka nilang mairerecommend sa grupo nila o kaya mabigyan ka ng opisyal na link. nakadepende din po sa detalye na ibibigay nyo kung appropriate po ito sa section na ito kasi mostly kung gusto nyo po mapadali yung paghahanap ng sagot specially dito sa forum ay nilalagay ng ating miyembro sa specific na section ang threads na ginawa nila, halimbawa na nito ay dun sa altcoins. sinabi ko ito para makatulong at hopefully po wag nyong masamain. happy lenten season dyan kabayan keep safe.

comments.author: SFR10
comments.body: Quote from: jack05 on April 07, 2023, 10:28:07 AMHello, I am looking for a Philippine trading group where a seminar with the founder of the project Onigiri Neko (name of the project), was held in January or February. Does anyone know what group it is?I managed to find a Youtube Q&A session with the founder [Onigiri Papa] from @Trader4lyf's "tweet on 9th of February".The name of the trading group in question is Traders Apprentice Pilipinas [also known as TAP]: FB group link
